channel.title: Need help on player files?
channel.description:
Well im looking to change it so when new players come to make an acc it will show what wave jad they are on and like the barrows, my server doesnt have barrows which im trying to add and it starts u on wave 63. So my question is, how do i add these in so when people make account they automatticaly show up
character-saradomin = 0 like what if i wonted to change to 15? how would that change for everybody, i looked in playerhandler and everything but idk where to look.

item.title: Need help on player files?
item.dc:creator: @Bulletthrust Bulletthrust
item.description:
@Bulletthrust wrote:

Does not help considering its not even in the player files.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on player files?
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

Find in player.java public int whatever; and change it to publicwhatever =14;

Read full topic
